title: Carson Daly | Democrats Debate Dictators While Trump Acts Like One: A Closer Look
description:
Seth takes a closer look at Democrats screaming over each other in a chaotic debate as President Trump tightens his authoritarian grip on power.

Then, Carson Daly talks about Last Call with Carson Daly, the success of The Voice and his stint as an intern for Jimmy Kimmel’s radio show. He also takes a few more questions exclusively for this podcast.

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
